com.chuchro.craps
Enum Bet.BetStatus

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<Bet.BetStatus>
      com.chuchro.craps.Bet.BetStatus
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Bet.BetStatus>
Enclosing class:
Bet
public static enum Bet.BetStatus
extends java.lang.Enum<Bet.BetStatus>

Enumerates the different states a bet can be in at any given time.

Author:
Doug Chuchro (doug@chuchro.net)

Enum Constant Summary
BET_LOST
          the previous roll has been evaluated as a loser for this bet, house will take the player's bet $
BET_OFF
          the bet is still on the table but will be inactive for the next roll, can neither be won nor lost
BET_ON
          the bet is currently on and will be evaluated after the next roll
BET_PULLED
          the player has chosen to take the bet off the table (only valid for certain bet types)
BET_PUSHED
          the previous roll has been evaluated as a "push" for this bet, player gets bet amount back but no winnings
BET_SETTLED
          the bet has been either won or lost and the player has been credited or debited, bet is no longer relevant
BET_WON
          the previous roll has been evaluated as a winner for this bet, player will be credited

static Bet.BetStatus[] values()
          Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
